Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
SHQ group:

Do you feel the majority of the group 
posts are relevant to your 
understanding of the Shinsengumi? 

  o Yes, it's all relevant. 
  o Most of the post are relevant. 
  o A few of the post are relevant, but most are not. 
  o No, most of the posts are not relevant. 


To vote, please visit the following web page:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ/surveys?id=1646860 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
